last_episode_to_air.name: Snow Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Fresh Beats use a giant blender to make snow for their winter show.

name: The Fresh Beat Band
overview:
The Fresh Beat Band is a children's TV show with original pop songs produced for Nick Jr. The Fresh Beats are Shout, Twist, Marina, and Kiki, described as four best friends in a band who go to music school together and love to sing and dance. The show was filmed at Paramount Studios in Los Angeles, California.

All episodes follow the same basic structure:

⁕Each episode begins with a song that foreshadows a problem that the band will solve.

⁕The band works together to solve the problem.

⁕When the problem is solved they perform a song with the problem and solution incorporated into the lyrics.

⁕Each episode concludes with a version of The Fresh Beat Band's closing song, "Great Day".

⁕The main characters dance to choreography by Mandy Moore; Sean Cheesman; Chuck Maldonado; Scotty Nguyen; Dreya Weber; Mary Ann Kellogg; Nakul Mahajan; Mihran Kirakosian; Susan Austin and Fred Tallaksen.

episodes.name: Stick Together
episodes.overview: Kiki, Marina, Twist and Shout must work together to prepare the music room for a surprise birthday party.

episodes.name: Stomp the House
episodes.overview: After Marina learns that she has a drum solo at the band's concert, she gives Twist and the rest of the group a preview of her routine, but when she gets too wild during her performance, her drum set breaks, forcing her to scavenge for spare parts.

episodes.name: Doggone It!
episodes.overview: When the dog Reed is watching runs off, the band decides to help him find it.

episodes.name: Loco Legs
episodes.overview: Shout is so excited to perform that he develops a case of loco legs.

episodes.name: Let's Boogie
episodes.overview: Marina, Twist and Shout are having trouble learning a dance that Kiki has choreographed.

episodes.name: Quack Shoes
episodes.overview: Shout must find an alternative when his tap shoes get sent up the flagpole.

episodes.name: Hippity Hop
episodes.overview: Marina is disappointed when Melody asks her to wear a bunny suit at a smoothie event.

episodes.name: Band Together
episodes.overview: Twist cannot decide what instrument he wants to play.

episodes.name: Bounce in the House
episodes.overview: Twist converts his room into an indoor bounce house after accidentally breaking Marina's drum.

episodes.name: Freeze Dance
episodes.overview: When Melody has to go to the market, she leaves the band in charge of her smoothie shop.

episodes.name: Smoothies to Go-Go
episodes.overview: Kiki's friends must put on their roller skates and help her deliver smoothies to her customers.

episodes.name: Hocus Pocus
episodes.overview: Twist wants to perform magic tricks in the upcoming talent show. But he mishears the magic words and all types of craziness unfolds.

episodes.name: Sing With Me
episodes.overview: Ms. Piccolo asks Kiki and Shout to write and sing a song together.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Hoedown
episodes.overview: Members of the band decide to play country music when Ms. Piccolo asks them to play a different style.

episodes.name: March Our Way
episodes.overview: Follow the Fresh Beats as they try to march to a rapping beat.

episodes.name: Glow For It
episodes.overview: It's a glow-in-the-dark extravaganza when the lights go out.

episodes.name: Rock to Sleep
episodes.overview: Shout finds a bugle in his cereal box and after playing all day long he can't fall to sleep Unfortunately neither can the rest of the Fresh Beats.

episodes.name: Rhyme Time
episodes.overview: Twist is practicing his raps for the picnic when he loses his voice.

episodes.name: Bubble Blast
episodes.overview: Twist creates a machine that makes bubbles, plays music and helps the band clean up the street.

episodes.name: Rock the Luau
episodes.overview: The fresh beat band play Hawaiian instruments.

episodes.name: Circus Mojo
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats save the circus by performing in it.

episodes.name: Honk Honk
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats build a new car from 57 boxes.

episodes.name: Camping With the Stars
episodes.overview: Twist goes camping for the first time.

episodes.name: Singin' in the Rain
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats make it rain so Marina can play along to the rhythm.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats reminisce about their favorite songs on the first day back at music school.

episodes.name: Jungle Jazz
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats help a plant find a home after it grows too big for Twist's room.

episodes.name: Balloon Buddy
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats discover a friendly balloon who likes to conga.

episodes.name: Presto Pants
episodes.overview: Twist and Shout build mechanical dancing pants.

episodes.name: Giant Pumpkin
episodes.overview: Shout grows a giant pumpkin to bring to a festival.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Violin
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats search for Kiki's missing violin.

episodes.name: Fresh Beats in Toyland
episodes.overview: Twist has a dream where the Fresh Beats are toys in Toyland (Holiday Special).

episodes.name: Zydeco Music Parade
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats go on a road trip and create their own instruments.

episodes.name: Car Wash Dance
episodes.overview: Fresh Beats do a car wash dance to clean their dirty car.

episodes.name: Follow the Leader
episodes.overview: Twist leads the Fresh Beats as conductor of the orchestra.

episodes.name: Kiki's Kickin' Chorus
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats put a chorus together to sing a new song.

episodes.name: Drum Party
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats throw a surprise birthday party for Marina.

episodes.name: Mixed Up Musical
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats sing songs and make a musical.

episodes.name: Band In A Jam Part 1
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats get stuck backstage at a concert and remember how they met.

episodes.name: Band In A Jam Part 2
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats get stuck backstage at a concert and remember how they met.

episodes.name: Step It Up
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats enter a stepping competition.

episodes.name: Graduation Day
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats graduate from music school.

episodes.name: Giant Pizza
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats help their new friend, Harper, open the Singin' Pizza Cafe.

episodes.name: Dance Floor Superhero
episodes.overview: Harper makes pizzas of the Mighty Music Band, comic book heroes, and decides to throw the Fresh Beats a high-flying dance party. He even gives them Mighty Music Band costumes! But then the Fresh Beats realize that their friends are frozen. It all turns out to be the work of the evil Deep Freeze (Nikki Blonsky) from their comic book. She mistakes the Fresh Beats for the Mighty Music Band because of their costumes. The Fresh Beats really need to stop Freeze and save their friends and their dance party.

episodes.name: Cool Pool Party
episodes.overview: Kiki, Marina, and Shout must refill the pool after they accidentally splash all the water out.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: Twist accidentally gives everyone a snow day.

episodes.name: Rock Star
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats are transported into the world of the Rock Star board game.

episodes.name: The Fresh Bots
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats create a series of robots that look like themselves.

episodes.name: Chimps in Charge
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats help their friend babysit a pair of chimpanzees.

episodes.name: Pink Swan
episodes.overview: Kiki auditions to be the lead in a new ballet.

episodes.name: Hoop Dreams
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats build a basketball court for the Junior Beats.

episodes.name: Bollywood Beats
episodes.overview: An Indian market is in town and the Fresh Beats meet a Genie and his sidekicks.

episodes.name: Yo! Fresh Beats Go Gabba Gabba!
episodes.overview: The Gabbas meet the Fresh Beats and zap the group to different places.

episodes.name: Ghost Band
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats have a musical showdown against a ghost band.

episodes.name: Veloci-Rap-Star
episodes.overview: When a manager recruits Twist to go on tour, he becomes a rap superstar.

episodes.name: Laughing Dance Master
episodes.overview: Laughing Dance Master trains the Fresh Beats for a dance festival using odd methods.

episodes.name: The Wizard of Song (Part 1)
episodes.overview: Marina is swept up in a wind storm and lands in Oz.

episodes.name: Royal Wedding
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats are excited for a royal wedding happening in town.

episodes.name: Keepin' It Green
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats have a concert to stop the Mayor from building over the park.

episodes.name: Yo! Fresh Beats Go Gabba Gabba!
episodes.overview: Plex accidentally transports the Gabba gang and the Fresh Beats to exotic locales every time he hiccups.

episodes.name: Hoop Dreams
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats plan to rock the half-time show at the Junior Beats' basketball game.

episodes.name: Dance-a-Thon
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats compete in an all-night dance contest.

episodes.name: Laughing Dance Master
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats audition for a dance festival but don't make the cut.

episodes.name: Pink Swan
episodes.overview: When a new ballet comes to town, Kiki is cast in the lead role as the Pink Swan and has to learn how to do five turns in a row.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: The Fresh Beats use a giant blender to make snow for their winter show.
